settings.support: Marvel Power Group is a woman-owned, ESG-focused transaction broker and commercial advisor. We offer services to clients in power, gas, water, industrial and transportation sectors.

settings.bold: Energy Transition is our core and only focus.
settings.text: We structure complex, meaningfully large renewable natural gas (RNG) and power transactions for companies committed to environmentally-sound, commercially-ready solutions. Our principals are experienced practitioners who have run companies, originated and closed complex deals, advocated and negotiated favorable policy and advanced technological innovation. With over three decades of combined experience in renewables specifically, our customers chose us, every time, for our unparalleled industry knowledge, market acumen, professionalism and commitment to their prosperity.

settings.title: $1B
settings.content: in closed RNG transactions in 2021 alone

settings.title: $4B
settings.content: in cumulative Renewable Energy and RNG closings

settings.title: $300 M
settings.content: in capital placed for client ventures

settings.paragraph1: Our clients are at the forefront of energy transition and innovation. Their mandate is complex: balance project needs with customer demands, lofty investment targets and development complexities. Layer on market volatility and regulatory risk and the scope becomes less manageable in-house. This is where Marvel comes in. We understand the task and bring deep expertise to addressing these challenges.

settings.title: Transaction Support
settings.points:
• Renewable Natural Gas offtakes
  • RIN, RTC, REC and LCFS brokerage
  • Renewable PPA origination
  • Contract negotiations and structuring

settings.title: Enterprise Strategy
settings.points:
• Market advisory
  • Risk management
  • Capital sourcing or deployment
  • Resource optimization

settings.title: Market Development
settings.points:
• New venture strategy
  • Go-to-market architecture
  • M&A support
  • Marketing and partnerships

settings.paragraph2: Our clients are time constrained and under-resourced. Agendas shift, budgets move and priorities change. We understand. We are agile, creative and immediately responsive to your various working styles, governance requirements and evolving needs.

settings.about: A serial entrepreneur and industry expert, Katherine has nearly 20 years of experience in running infrastructure businesses and closing complex energy transactions. As the sole founder of Marvel, in 2019, Katherine saw an opportunity to run a business her way — leading with high integrity, unmatched focus on service quality and utmost commitment to driving customers’ yields.
settings.history:
• CEO, Renovar, Shell Digital Ventures
  • CCO, Lightsource bp
  • Co-Founder and CCO, AMS (acquired by Fluence, NASDAQ: FLNC)
  • VP and Director, Evolution Markets
  • Principal, Pacific Gas and Electric Company
settings.education:
• BS, Finance, University of San Francisco
  • MBA, Finance, Duke University

settings.about: Sam has over 10 years of experience in renewable power and gas markets, with expertise in renewable fuels, demand side management, energy procurement, energy storage and analytics. Throughout his career, Sam has worked on all sides of the transaction, in each case leading with integrity, customer service and a keen focus on delivering results that positively impact the client’s bottom line and environmental impact.
settings.history:
• Director, AMS (acquired by Fluence, NASDAQ: FLNC)
  • Manager, EnerNOC (acquired by Enel, BIT: ENEL)
  • Regional Manager, United Technologies Corporation
settings.education:
• BA, Political Science, University of Pennsylvania
  • MBA, Finance, Babson College
